duties_responsibilities.duty: Attainment of catering/food and beverage sales goals tied to the overall performance of the hotel.
Effectively servicing clients/groups and maintaining the contracted food and beverage minimum.
Proactively conduct solicitation calls, tours, and entertain clients specific to needs respective to the assigned property.
Monitor and evaluate trends within the market segment.
Approach all encounters with guests and employees in an attentive, friendly, courteous, and service-oriented manner.
Adheres to Aimbridge Hospitality’s established regulations, company standards, catering/meeting standards, and related catering sales metrics.
Develop a full working knowledge of the operations and policies of the hotel and applicable departments.
Maintain strong visibility in the local community and industry organizations as applicable.
Assist in implementing and/or participating in special promotions relating to direct sales segments.
Attend daily/weekly/monthly meetings and any other functions required by management.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent required; previous convention/event and catering sales experience preferred. Must have a valid driver’s license for the applicable state.
